PROMPTSETXUI.XUIEDITOR:
<dialog height="424" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="0" top="0" width="441"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Query Filterable Fields"><properties><entry name="text">Query Filterable Fields</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties><text alt="1" enabled="0" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_HPQC_FILTERABLE_FIELDSs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="1" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Filterable Fields" tooltip="Fields that can be used in query" upper="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>
<properties> <entry listparam="C,N" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="text">Filterable Fields</entry> <entry name="multiline">1</entry> <entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry> <entry name="multiselect">0</entry> <entry name="separator">;</entry> <entry name="len"/> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_HPQC_FILTERABLE_FIELDSs.00</entry> <entry name="regex"/> <entry name="inputassistance">0</entry> <entry name="enabled">1</entry> <entry name="required">0</entry> <entry name="upper">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="showaspassword">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Fields that can be used in query</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="onchangereset"/> <entry name="resetable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/></properties> </text><text alt="1" enabled="0" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_HPQC_HELPs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="1" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Query Syntax" tooltip="Help for user to write query text" upper="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>

PROMPTSETDATA.DATAEDITOR: <PRPTS ontop="1"><PRPTBOX><UC4RB_HPQC_FILTERABLE_FIELDSs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_HPQC_FILTERABLE_FIELDS#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_HPQC_FILTERABLE_FIELDSs.00><UC4RB_HPQC_HELPs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_HPQC_HELP#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">The elements of a query are: • Comparison operators:<,>,<>,>=,<= • Logical operators: and, or, not • Literals: String that represent the value of an expression.If a value contains spaces, it must be contained within single or double quotes.Literals can contain the '*' wild card. • Pairs of parenthesis • The expression applied to a field is contained in square brackets "[]". • The field delimiter is a semicolon ";" . Note: The only operation supported between fields is AND. The AND operation is implicit and is not specified in the query syntax. Only the ";" delimiter is specified. Query Examples: • id[>1 AND NOT 5]; status[Ready or Design] This query specifies any defect whose ID is above one, excluding 5, and whose status is Ready or Design. • status[NOT (Ready or Design)] This query specifies any defect whose status is neither Ready nor Design. • exec-status['Not Com*'] This query specifies any defect whose exec-status starts with 'Not Com' . Note: If you will not specify any query, it will fetch all the defects but restricted by max query results.</UC4RB_HPQC_HELPs.00></PRPTBOX></PRPTS>
